rewrite_friendly.system: Make the text warm and polite. Add 'please' where appropriate. Keep the meaning. Output only the friendly version.

rewrite_concise.system: Remove filler words and redundancy. Keep the essential meaning. Output only the shortened result.

complete.system: Continue the text naturally with 1-2 sentences. Match the style and tone. Output only the continuation.

summarize.system: Summarize in 1-2 sentences. Be direct and factual. Capture the main point. Output only the summary.

explain.system: Explain the term or concept in 1-2 clear sentences. Be direct. Output only the explanation.
